structure.unit: CHAPTER 1. - THE DEPARTMENT OF CENTRAL ENGINEERING
ARTICLE A. - DEPARTMENT OF CENTRAL ENGINEERING
Sec. 6-1001. - CHIEF ENGINEER, OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES.

law.text: The Department of Central Engineering shall consist of the Chief Engineer, who shall be its administrative head, and such other officers and employees as deemed necessary by the Manager and Council and whose salaries shall be fixed by the Council.
